thread.title: Harry Mottram
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Harry Mottram

author: Harry Mottram
title: Harry Mottram
text: This is my second purchase in the past several months. TFT has made significant improvements over the many years in convenience, service, and prices. Prices were much cheaper this year than three years ago when I purchased tires for the same two vehicles. You can't beat their on-line reservation service for convenience. Sales people are very polite, sir this and sir that. Kinda reminds me of my days in the Corps! Semper Fi
